definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: be sick (?; cf. Syr. nas id., and esp. nasiys debilis, infirmus, aegrotans, etc., PS:2387; Targum [[נְסַס]] be sad; As. nasâsu, wail, lament Dl:HWB 472; Ar. nas=a is go at a gentle pace);—only

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pt. act. (si vera l.) [[כִּמְסׂס נׁסֵס]] Is 10:18 like the wasting away of a sick man (so Thes Ew De Che Di Du).
